Requirement.formula: #program; var object = Land::getFirstInstanceOfObject(Building::find('MegaPlayscape')); var bonus = Building::getArrangeBonus(object); return bonus >= 5;
#program; var object = Land::getFirstInstanceOfObject(Building::find('JunkBase')); var bonus = Building::getArrangeBonus(object); return bonus >= 10;

Objective.expression: #program; var fort = Land::getFirstInstanceOfObject(Building::find('RuffianFort')); if(isNULL(fort)) { return 0; } var piecesTotal = 5; var damageDealt = 0; var maxDamage = toDouble(System::getConfigValue('__Homergeddon_Spreadsheet_Config:Forts:RuffianFort_DefenseHealth__')); for(var i = 0; i < piecesTotal; i++) { var pieceDamage = ObjectVars::getVariableInt('Obj_RuffianFort', 'piece' + toString(i) + 'Damage'); damageDealt += pieceDamage; } return damageDealt;
